tool.name: queries.mitochondrial_genes
tool.description: Mitochondrial gene symbols for specific organism through BioMart.

configfiles.configfile:
import scanpy.api as sc
sc.queries.mitochondrial_genes( host = '$host', org = '$org',)

param.name: org
param.label: org
param.help: Organism to query. Currently available are human ('hsapiens') and mouse ('mmusculus').

data.name: A `pd.Index` containing mitochondrial gene symbols.
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: A `pd.Index` containing mitochondrial gene symbols.

tool.help:
Mitochondrial gene symbols for specific organism through BioMart.
Parameters ---------- host : {{'www.ensembl.org', ...}} A valid BioMart host URL. org : {{'hsapiens', 'mmusculus'}} Organism to query. Currently available are human ('hsapiens') and mouse ('mmusculus').
Returns ------- A `pd.Index` containing mitochondrial gene symbols.
